div.div: Is adultery the key to solving China’s corruption problem?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SHPYPS&via=Digg&text=The Mistress-Industrial Complex

div.a: The 61 Countries A Mad Despot Could Instantly Unplug From The Internet

div.div: According to new research from network monitoring company Renesys, it could just as easily happen in many other countries too, including Greenland, Yemen, and Ethiopia. Sixty-one of the world’s countries have just one or two service providers connecting them to the rest of the internet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R0Dm9C&via=Digg&text=The 61 Countries A Mad Despot Could Instantly Unplug From The Internet

div.div: EVEN IF HEAVEN'S REAL, YOU'RE NOT SEEING IT

Thrust back into popular consciousness by a surgeon claiming that “Heaven is Real,” the NDE has come under both theological and scientific scrutiny for its supposed ability to preview the great gig in the sky. But getting to see Heaven is hell—you have to die. Or do you?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11sfyxa&via=Digg&text=The Death Of 'Near Death'

div.a: Silencing The Voices Of Militants On Twitter

div.div: Should Twitter shut down accounts belonging to militant groups?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SzlLUv&via=Digg&text=Silencing The Voices Of Militants On Twitter

div.div: The blueprints of some visionary directors' most iconic scenes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11BcoGt&via=Digg&text=Production Storyboards From 15 Beloved Films

div.a: D.A.R.E. Will No Longer Talk To Kids About Marijuana

div.div: D.A.R.E., the national nonprofit that has promoted "Drug Abuse Resistance Education" to elementary, middle, and high school students since the early 1980s, will all but drop anti-drug material from its curriculum for younger students.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11sigTk&via=Digg&text=D.A.R.E. Will No Longer Talk To Kids About Marijuana

div.div: A new survey shows that you’re more likely to spend a ratty dollar bill than a crisp new one.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TASPLK&via=Digg&text=The Dirty Money Stimulus (Literally)

div.div: Wait. What exactly is a pigeonhole anyway?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11EcYmP&via=Digg&text=What Is A Pigeonhole?

div.a: Did VICE Just Out John McAfee's Hiding Spot In Photo Metadata?

div.div: Oops. Vice, an online magazine known for in-depth pieces on often salacious topics today bragged that it is with the embattled technologist John McAfee, keeping tabs with his him during his time on the run. Their headline says it all: “We are with John McAfee, suckers.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TFprBV&via=Digg&text=Did VICE Just Out John McAfee's Hiding Spot In Photo Metadata?

div.div: THIS IS YOUR BRAIN ON FOOTBALL

div.a: What An Athlete's Brain Looks Like After A History Of Head Trauma

div.div: There's been a lot of talk lately about the damage repeated head trauma can cause. Here's photographic evidence.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SqArE3&via=Digg&text=What An Athlete's Brain Looks Like After A History Of Head Trauma

div.div: Named after its creator, Kuratas is the product of nearly three years of forging, hammering, and coding.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QCqftV&via=Digg&text=Kuratas: The $1.4 Million, 4-Ton Mech Robot

div.div: Why a strand of hair bends or falls the way it does may sound like a simple question, but the answer is rather convoluted.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/THg7Nd&via=Digg&text=What Makes Hair Curly?

div.a: Banned From Making Money, These YouTubers Share Their Stories

div.div: Recently, YouTubers have been reporting that they are getting banned from AdSense due to over-zealous fans clicking on their ads too much. Here are a few of their stories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vg9OR0&via=Digg&text=Banned From Making Money, These YouTubers Share Their Stories

div.a: How Script Kiddies Can Hijack Your Browser To Steal Your Password

div.div: Be careful what you type on your computer while surfing the Web. It very well could be funneled to a script kiddie who has appropriated a handful of lines of code and inserted it into his site.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZct5Y&via=Digg&text=How Script Kiddies Can Hijack Your Browser To Steal Your Password

div.a: GitHub Hires Former Yelp CFO To Help It Spend Andreessen’s $100M

div.div: Today, via blog post, GitHub CEO and co-founder Tom Preston-Werner announced that the company had hired Vlado Herman as its new CFO.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YsBmKv&via=Digg&text=GitHub Hires Former Yelp CFO To Help It Spend Andreessen’s $100M

div.a: Chris Brown Creeps Back Onto Twitter, Instagram

div.div: After a week-long gentleman's intermission from Twitter, Chris Brown is back.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11splmX&via=Digg&text=Chris Brown Creeps Back Onto Twitter, Instagram

div.a: Fans Throw 21,000 Teddy Bears Onto The Ice After Goal

div.div: Often imitated, never duplicated, the WHL's Calgary Hitmen's annual Teddy Bear Toss is the best spectacle in junior hockey, and it's for a good cause.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VgoL5k&via=Digg&text=Fans Throw 21,000 Teddy Bears Onto The Ice After Goal

div.a: U.S. Sees Syria Prepping Chemical Weapons For Possible Attack

div.div: Engineers working for the Assad regime in Syria have begun combining the two chemical precursors needed to weaponize sarin gas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UC8jQl&via=Digg&text=U.S. Sees Syria Prepping Chemical Weapons For Possible Attack

div.a: How I Gamified The Google Interview (And How Can You Too)

div.div: Getting a job at Google is tough, so this guy turned it into a game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WxLoTQ&via=Digg&text=How I Gamified The Google Interview (And How Can You Too)

div.div: Using the results of a NASA experiment—where spiders are put under the influence of certain psychoactive substances—French designer Guillaume Lehoux has designed a series of bowls, entitled 'SOD_project', that replicates the webs spun by the drugged up spiders.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VrtjrG&via=Digg&text=Drugged Up Spiders ‘Design’ Web Bowls

div.a: The Delicate Relationship I Have With My Keyboard

div.div: What would we do without these very important keys.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vr91Cm&via=Digg&text=The Delicate Relationship I Have With My Keyboard

div.a: Somebody Is Petitioning The White House To Build A Death Star

div.div: "Those who sign here petition the United States government to secure funding and resources, and begin construction on a Death Star by 2016."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNA4n0&via=Digg&text=Somebody Is Petitioning The White House To Build A Death Star

div.div: ALSO WON'T STOP PARROTING 'TOY STORY' LINES

div.a: The Real-Life Pixar Lamp That Won't Let You Turn It Off

div.div: Called the "Pinokio Lamp,' this robotic lamp interacts with its environment and people. Unfortunately, it isn't capable of hopping around.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RvEMZM&via=Digg&text=The Real-Life Pixar Lamp That Won't Let You Turn It Off

div.div: In an exclusive jailhouse interview, an Amish sect leader talks about the beard-cutting that could lock him up for life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QXlts9&via=Digg&text=A Bishop Behind Bars

div.div: Don't panic. You might have trouble finding GIFs to describe your feelings for a little bit, because there's a exploit spreading on Tumblr that's effectively shutting down your favorite sites. And, if you so much as click on the wrong post, shutting down your own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TEWh5O&via=Digg&text=Massive Worm Eating Through Tumblr

div.a: Full-Time NFL Kicker, Part-Time Shoe Cobbler

div.div: You wouldn't expect that one of the most important pieces of equipment an NFL kicker owns is a rotary saw.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SqHtcb&via=Digg&text=Full-Time NFL Kicker, Part-Time Shoe Cobbler

div.a: The Amazing History And Figures Of The First Nuclear-Powered Aircraft Carrier

div.div: The USS Enterprise, the first nuclear aircraft carrier in the world, was officially retired over the at a ceremony in Norfolk, Virginia—special appearance by Captain Kirk included. Here is her amazing history.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SnCzMT&via=Digg&text=The Amazing History And Figures Of The First Nuclear-Powered Aircraft Carrier

div.a: 'Star Trek Into Darkness' Teaser Poster Is Revealed

div.div: "Star Trek Into Darkness" has released some teaser artwork.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TCAVIw&via=Digg&text='Star Trek Into Darkness' Teaser Poster Is Revealed

div.div: NO SUCH THING AS A NEW BEAT

div.a: A History Of Hip-Hop Sampling Video Games

div.div: Samples for hip-hop songs can come from a wide variety of places, and as this supercut from Spin proves, video games are a popular choice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TDd5u9&via=Digg&text=A History Of Hip-Hop Sampling Video Games

div.a: The French Plan To End Homework

div.div: In the name of equality, the French government has proposed doing away with homework in elementary and junior high school.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SDToTG&via=Digg&text=The French Plan To End Homework

div.a: Drake And Guy Fieri Hung Out

div.div: We're not going to sit here and say Drake and Guy Fieri are buddies, but we will say Drake has been Instagrammed cooking something alongside Guy Fieri.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11ovqRd&via=Digg&text=Drake And Guy Fieri Hung Out
